org.elephant.mapper
Class DocumentHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.elephant.mapper.DocumentHandler
public class DocumentHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This class allows a map to be saved and loaded. It uses JDOM to create and interpret XML.

Copyright (c) 2001
